resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/106900</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>106900</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770200610</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Battery-Resistor Circuit</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Batterie-Widerstand Stromkreis</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Circuit de Batterie-Résistance</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Circuito Do Bateria-Resistor</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Circuito Del Batteria-Resistore</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μπαταρία-αντιστάτης κύκλωμα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Circuito Del Bateri'a-Resistor</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Look inside a resistor to see how it works. Increase the battery voltage to make more electrons flow though the resistor. Increase the resistance to block the flow of electrons. Watch the current and resistor temperature change.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Schauen Sie innerhalb eines Widerstandes, um zu 
sehen, wie es funktioniert. Erhöhen Sie die Batteriespannung, 
um mehr Elektronen zu bilden fließen zwar der Widerstand. 
Erhöhen Sie den Widerstand, um den Fluß der Elektronen zu 
blocken. Überwachen Sie den Strom- und 
Widerstandtemperaturwechsel.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Regardez à l'intérieur d'une résistance pour 
voir comment cela fonctionne. Augmentez la tension de batterie 
pour faire plus d'électrons coulent cependant la résistance. 
Augmentez la résistance pour bloquer l'écoulement des 
électrons. Observez le changement de température de courant et
de résistance.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Olhe dentro de um resistor para ver como trabalha.
Aumente a tensão da bateria para fazer mais elétrons fluem 
though o resistor. Aumente a resistência para obstruir o fluxo 
dos elétrons. Preste atenção à mudança de temperatura da 
corrente e do resistor.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Osservi all'interno di un resistore per vedere 
come funziona. Aumenti la tensione della batteria per fare più 
elettroni fluiscono comunque il resistore. Aumenti la resistenza
per ostruire il flusso degli elettroni. Guardi il mutamento di 
temperatura del resistore e della corrente.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοιτάξτε μέσα σε έναν αντιστάτη για να 
δείτε πώς λειτουργεί. Αυξήστε την τάση μπαταριών
για να κάνετε περισσότερα ηλεκτρόνια να ρεύσουν αν και ο 
αντιστάτης. Αυξήστε την αντίσταση για να εμποδίσετε τη ροή 
των ηλεκτρονίων. Προσέξτε το ρεύμα και την αλλαγή 
θερμοκρασίας αντιστατών.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Mire dentro de un resistor para ver cómo trabaja.
Aumente el voltaje de la batería para hacer más electrones 
fluyen sin embargo el resistor. Aumente la resistencia para 
bloquear el flujo de electrones. Mire el cambio de temperatura 
de la corriente y del resistor.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770200610</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>no</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>106900</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/battery-resistor-circuit</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
